info.name: Talk XMPP Bridge
info.summary: A bridge between Nextcloud Talk and the XMPP protocol.
info.description:
This app bridges Nextcloud Talk conversations with XMPP.
It allows for two-way communication between: - 1-on-1 Talk conversations and XMPP direct messages. - Talk group conversations and XMPP Multi-User Chats (MUCs).
